## Chars type

Converts a string into a union type of its unique characters.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare type Chars<S, Acc = never> = S extends `${infer Head}${infer Tail}` ? Chars<Tail, Acc | Head> : Acc;
```
**References:** [Chars](./react.chars.md)
